column5: Hi guys, any suggestions for salmon charters out of the east end (Bowmanville) of Lake Ontario???

Fishunter!!! Lloyd is great. In all honesty for me to fork out $$ for a guide is a big deal and he would be a first choice evertime. Been twice for walleye with him and next on tthe bucket list is Lake O for salmon.
x2 Awesome guy to spend the day with.  Lloyd Daume U & Me Guide Service http://www.bayofquin...eyefishing.com/
X5 Lloyd going to setup a charter with him soon for lake O
To elaborate...four of us, two years ago...through the rotation five times, 20 fish landed.  PLUS Lloyd is all about a safe, enjoyable time on the water.

including 1 so big it broke the lead core about 6 colours out. Would have loved to see that fish, but Juli's screaming was so loud from exitement I think she spooked it She still managed to boat some decent ones tho
